title: README overhaul with badges, screenshots, and quick start
description:
Transform README.md into an impressive open source landing page.

**Must include:**
- Project logo/banner
- Badges (build status, npm version, license, PRs welcome)
- Animated GIF or screenshot showing the plugin in action
- One-liner description
- Feature highlights with icons
- Quick start guide (< 5 minutes to running)
- Links to detailed docs
- "Why Moe?" section explaining the value prop
- Comparison table vs alternatives (if any)
definitionOfDone: Screenshot or GIF of plugin UI
Quick start works on all platforms
